message: I get out of bed and leave my room.
At the top of the stairs, I realize that the lights in the living room are on. Is it Granny?
I open the door and bump into someone who's just leaving.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Uh! ...Why are you still here?"
It's Noiz.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you doing here?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Is that what you say when you run into someone?"
Where does he get off talking to me like that?

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Uh, sorry?"
I start to turn away, but he grabs my arm.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Ngh! What?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Did you use your power on me too?"

name: ノイズ
message: "You remember playing Rhyme now, right? So fight me already."

name: ノイズ
message: "We can do it right here. I'm not picky."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's not funny. This is my home."

name: ノイズ
message: "What's that gotta do with Rhyme?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Give it a rest, man."
I pull my arm away with a glare.
All this idiot cares about is Rhyme. Screw him.

name: ノイズ
message: "It's called Scrap, right? That power of yours. Have you always used it to get your way?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Like hell I have!"

name: ノイズ
message: "You can use it to control people's minds though, right? You telling me you've never used it in Rhyme?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hell if I know. I just know I've played the game before, nothing else."

name: ノイズ
message: "Bullshit. How do you explain what you did when we fought?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm telling you I don't remember!"
I snap my mouth shut. I didn't mean to shout.
Noiz just stands there, glaring at me.
His eyes search my face, unblinking, like he's trying to sniff out a lie.
As intimidated as I am by the intensity of his gaze, I don't turn away.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Look, I really don't remember. Even if I did use it during our fight somehow, I don't know how to use it now. I'm not lying."

name: 蒼葉
message: "If you can accept that, then fine, I'll fight you. But that's not what you're after, is it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Look, if I ever feel like I could fight you, I'll take you on. I swear."

name: ノイズ
message: "...You mean it?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. You can hold me to it."

name: ノイズ
message: "...Fine. I'll believe you. This time."

name: ノイズ
message: "But you better not run when that time comes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I won't."
Noiz looks me in the eye to make sure I got the message, then slips past me into the hall.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where're you going?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Takin' a walk."
I sigh as I watch him leave.
Honestly... even if I do learn to control my power, I don't want to use it unless I have to.
This is the power that hurt Mizuki. I never want to feel like that again.
I came downstairs to take my mind off things, but it doesn't look like that's in the cards.
I let out another deep sigh and return to my room, even more depressed than before.
I don't really feel like sleeping, but I crawl into bed and close my eyes anyway.
